org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Interface Sizeable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Positionable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CollisionArea
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, CollisionBox, CollisionCircle, CollisionPolygon, ConcurrentPointQuadTree, ConcurrentRegionQuadTree, EquilateralTriangle, PointQuadTree, Polygon, QuadTreeAwareCollisionBox, QuadTreeAwareCollisionCircle, QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon, Rectangle, RegionQuadTree, RegularHexagon, RegularPentagon, RegularPolygon, Shape, Triangle

    public interface Sizeable
extends Positionable
    A common interface for objects that can be sized with an x and y dimension

        boolean contains(Sizeable shape)
        Returns if this shape contains the specified shape
        Parameters:
        shape - The Sizeable to check
        Returns:
        True if this Sizeable is inside this shape

                              org.mini2Dx.gdx.math.Vector2 pointB)
        Returns if this shape intersects a line segment
        Parameters:
        pointA - The first point in the line segment
        pointB - The second point in the line segment
        Returns:
        True if this shape intersects the line segment

      • intersectsLineSegment

        boolean intersectsLineSegment(float x1,
                              float y1,
                              float x2,
                              float y2)
        Returns if this shape intersects a line segment
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - The y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - The x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - The y coordinate of the second point
        Returns:
        True if this shape intersects the line segment

      • getWidth

        float getWidth()
        Returns the width of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getHeight

        float getHeight()
        Returns the height of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • setRadius

        void setRadius(float radius)
        Sets the radius of this shape. For Polygon shapes, this will stretch in/out the shape from its center. Note that Polygons must be equilateral.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius in pixels

      • scale

        void scale(float scale)
        Scales the radius of this shape. For Polygon shapes, this will stretch in/out the shape from its center. Note that Polygons must be equilateral.
        Parameters:
        scale - The amount to scale by (e.g. 2.0 = double the size)

      • getMinX

        float getMinX()
        Returns min X coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The left-most x coordinate

      • getMinY

        float getMinY()
        Returns min Y coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The up-most y coordinate

      • getMaxX

        float getMaxX()
        Returns max X coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The right-most x coordinate

      • getMaxY

        float getMaxY()
        Returns max Y coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        The bottom-most y coordinate

      • getCenterX

        float getCenterX()
        Returns the center x coordinate of this object. Note for Circle this is the same as x.
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getCenterY

        float getCenterY()
        Returns the center y coordinate of this object. Note for Circle this is the same as y.
        Returns:
        0 by default

        void setCenter(float x,
               float y)
        Sets the center x,y coordinate of this object

        x - The x coordinate of the shape's center
        y - The y coordinate of the shape's center
